parameter.name: open-loop-sampling-rate
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter specifies in Hz the sampling rate used for the open-loop recording.

parameter.name: open-loop-quantization
open-loop-center-frequency-offset-rhc
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter specifies the offset in Hz of the open-loop recording center frequency with respect to the nominal carrier return link conversion for right hand circular polarization.

parameter.name: open-loop-center-frequency-offset-lhc
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter specifies the offset in Hz of the open-loop recording center frequency with respect to the nominal carrier return link conversion for left hand circular polarization.

parameter.name: subchannel-1-offset
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter specifies the offset in Hz of the open-loop recording subchannel 1 center frequency with respect to the open-loop recording center frequency specified for the polarization selected for this subchannel. If this subchannel is 'off', this parameter shall be flagged as undefined.

parameter.typeDefinition: SEQUENCE (SIZE (1)) OF IntUnsigned (0 .. 2) { off (0) , rhc (1) , lhc (2) }
parameter.name: subchannel-1-polarization
subchannel-2-offset
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter specifies the offset in Hz of the open-loop recording subchannel 2 center frequency with respect to the open-loop recording center frequency specified for the polarization selected for this subchannel. If this subchannel is 'off', this parameter shall be flagged as undefined.

parameter.typeDefinition: SEQUENCE (SIZE (1)) OF IntUnsigned (0 .. 2) { off (0) , rhc (1) , lhc (2) }
parameter.name: subchannel-2-polarization
subchannel-3-offset
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter specifies the offset in Hz of the open-loop recording subchannel 3 center frequency with respect to the open-loop recording center frequency specified for the polarization selected for this subchannel. If this subchannel is 'off', this parameter shall be flagged as undefined.

parameter.typeDefinition: SEQUENCE (SIZE (1)) OF IntUnsigned (0 .. 2) { off (0) , rhc (1) , lhc (2) }
parameter.name: subchannel-3-polarization
subchannel-4-offset
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter specifies the offset in Hz of the open-loop recording subchannel 4 center frequency with respect to the open-loop recording center frequency specified for the polarization selected for this subchannel. If this subchannel is 'off', this parameter shall be flagged as undefined.

parameter.typeDefinition: SEQUENCE (SIZE (1)) OF IntUnsigned (0 .. 2) { off (0) , rhc (1) , lhc (2) }
parameter.name: subchannel-4-polarization
